title: Petals Caught in a Twister
text: A strong gust buffets three travelers, forcing them to bend this way and that. Gray diagonal lines suggest rain is also falling on these unfortunate travelers. They are hurrying to a farmhouse whose thatched roof can be seen in the hill ahead of them. Zeshin carefully observed the postures and movement of human bodies and created this comical but realistic composition.
description: still life; 2 barrels at L; 2 baskets with covers at R; swirling pink petals; yellow butterfly, URC
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
